body: Help, I was playing a match and when it finished, in the chat appeared "The Alpha Crate was reward to Programezed"  or something like that, can anyone help me?
body_tagged: Help, I was playing a match and when it finished, in the chat appeared "The Alpha Crate was reward to Programezed"  or something like that, can anyone help me?
title: What is the Alpha Crate?

replies.body:
Crates which contain some items.
Unfortunately, you literally can't do anything (aka sell them for credits) with them. Only thing you can do is spend money to open them https://avicus.net/shop
replies.body_tagged:
Crates which contain some items.
Unfortunately, you literally can't do anything (aka sell them for credits) with them. Only thing you can do is spend money to open them https://avicus.net/shop

replies.body:
To add onto what Porky said after you open the crates you get lottery tickets where you can win prizes & ranks :P
Recommend buying keys when you have 5 of a certain amount of crates.
